question_sentence: Democrat Tim Walz and Republican JD Vance faced off in their first — and only — vice presidential debate this week. Where did the debate take place?
evidence: The matchup between Ohio Sen. JD Vance and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz took place Tuesday in New York City. The event drew more than 43 million TV viewers, according to Nielsen estimates.

question_sentence: Which union workers along the East and Gulf Coasts went on strike this week against automation and for increased wages?
evidence: Thousands of dockworkers walked off the job to protest a growing trend among port operators to increase the number of cranes and driverless trucks — which use fewer humans — to shuttle goods from container ships.

question_sentence: Which country swore in its first female president this week?
evidence: Claudia Sheinbaum was sworn in Tuesday as Mexico’s first female president. She made promises to limit prices for gasoline and food, support business investment, and crack down on the drug cartels that have strengthened their hold over much of the country.

question_sentence: Which state recently banned several food dyes from K-12 public school meals?
evidence: California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed a bill into law that bans the use of red dye No. 40 and five other chemicals from use in foods served at public schools. These ingredients are often found in some popular cereals, ice creams, drinks, candy, ice pops, chips, jellies and more.

question_sentence: Former President Jimmy Carter celebrated a milestone birthday this week. How old did he turn?
evidence: Jimmy Carter turned 100 on Tuesday, making him the first American president to reach triple digits.

question_sentence: An annular solar eclipse on Wednesday created a blazing "ring of fire" in the sky for some viewers in which countries?
evidence: Although the path of the eclipse tracked over the Pacific and Atlantic oceans and Antarctica, only parts of Argentina and Chile, including Easter Island, were able to see the “ring of fire.”

question_sentence: Which cell phone carrier encountered a major outage that sparked a flurry of customer complaints across the US?
evidence: Verizon customers nationwide reported an inability to connect to the network on Monday. Many subscribers complained that their phones had been stuck in "SOS" mode throughout the day, allowing only emergency calls via satellite.

question_sentence: Which American car brand is working to address safety concerns after at least 13 fires were linked to some of its plug-in models?
evidence: Nearly 200,000 Jeep plug-in hybrids have been recalled over fire risks. Owners were told to park outside and away from other vehicles until repairs are completed.

question_sentence: Which streaming platform is fighting a $170 million defamation lawsuit involving its hit show "Baby Reindeer?"
evidence: A Scottish woman accused of stalking “Baby Reindeer” creator and star Richard Gadd can proceed with her defamation lawsuit against Netflix after a federal judge in California refused to dismiss all of the claims.

question_sentence: LeBron James and his 19-year-old son Bronny are expected to soon make history as the first father-son duo to play together on which NBA team?
evidence: Basketball icon LeBron James and his son Bronny are prepping for their historic debut with the Los Angeles Lakers. Nineteen-year-old Bronny shared his hopes for the upcoming season this week at his first Lakers media day.

question_sentence: Why is the Caesar Rodney Institute suing Delaware’s Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Control (DNREC)?
choices: To stop the construction of a new coal power plant
To challenge the approval of offshore wind projects
To demand stricter regulations on fishing
To oppose the expansion of a wildlife sanctuary

question_sentence: What is the name of the near-Earth asteroid that became Earth’s new mini-moon on September 29, 2024?
What is the primary goal of the Wilmington Airport’s terminal expansion project?
choices: To expand the terminal and improve passenger experience

question_sentence: What is one of the main reasons for the International Longshoremen’s Association (ILA) strike at the Port of Wilmington?
choices: A) Disputes over automation and wages

question_sentence: How has Caleb Fauria managed to excel for the Delaware Blue Hens despite his Type 1 diabetes?
choices: By following a strict diet and exercise regimen
By using an insulin pump and continuous glucose monitor
By taking regular breaks during games

question_sentence: Who purchased the Chaddsford Winery in 2024?
When did girls flag football make its debut at Delaware high schools?
How much money did Barclays employees donate to fulfill teacher wish lists at Howard High School of Technology?
Where did Delaware rank overall in WalletHub’s 2024 study of the best and worst states for teachers?
According to the University of Delaware voter poll, what percentage of the vote does Kamala Harris hold over Donald Trump in Delaware?
